Nerves
                
If vasculitis affects your nerves, you may have numbness, tingling, and weakness in various parts of your body. You also may have a loss of feeling or strength in your hands and feet and shooting pains in your arms and legs.",NHLBI,Vasculitis
How to diagnose Vasculitis ?,"Your doctor will diagnose vasculitis based on your signs and symptoms, your medical history, a physical exam, and test results.
